p: A total of 797 miRNAs belonging to two libraries were significantly differently expressed based on fold change (≥1 or ≤-1) and P-value (<0.05) criteria (Table S5); among them, 388 miRNAs were up-regulated and 409 miRNAs were down-regulated. We evaluated the miRNA distribution among two libraries and determined that 751 miRNAs were commonly expressed in flower and fruit libraries (Figure 4). The results of comparing the specifically expressed miRNAs showed that 24 miRNAs were expressed only in flower and 22 miRNAs were expressed only in fruit, respectively (Table S5 and Figure 4).
